description: Main entry point for a Flutter application, setting up the app structure, navigation, and integrating state management via Provider. It defines the MyApp widget initializing MaterialApp with routes, a theme, and a home page. The home page includes UI elements such as AppBar, a filter indicator, content placeholder, and a FAB to navigate to the filter screen.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up theme, routes, and global providers.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen; displays app title, filter indicator, and navigation to filter settings.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and MyHomePage.
